story_parts.text: A lion was getting ready to go to Disney World. He had never been there before and was very excited. He packed his bags and got on the plane.

next_options.0: The lion has a great time at Disney World, meeting all the characters and riding all the rides
next_options.1: The lion gets homesick and decides to go home early

story_parts.text: The lion has a great time at Disney World, meeting all the characters and riding all the rides. He especially loves the roller coasters and goes on them over and over again. By the end of the trip, the lion is exhausted but happy, and he can't wait to come back again.

next_options.0: The lion goes home and takes a long nap
next_options.1: The lion stays at Disney World and becomes a permanent resident

story_parts.text: The lion goes home and takes a long nap. He is so tired from all the fun he had at Disney World that he sleeps for hours. When he wakes up, he is refreshed and ready to start planning his next trip to Disney World.

next_options.0: The lion decides to go back to Disney World as soon as possible and starts planning his trip right away
next_options.1: The lion enjoys his time at home and doesn't feel the need to go back to Disney World anytime soon

quiz_parts.question: What does the lion do at Disney World?

options.2: He goes on the roller coasters over and over again
options.3: He is exhausted by the end of the trip

quiz_parts.question: What does the lion do when he gets home from Disney World?

options.1: He starts planning his next trip to Disney World
